title: losing connection in lol client
body:
last game i lost connection in game for +- 3 mins internet was ok 19Mb/s its my normal speed so probably nto my fail it lost my promo really great, but than i log new game and in select it drop again and give me -3 LP and again my internet was ok chrome work TS3 work normal Mb/s only lol drop so problem is not at me can i get back that 3 LP?
http://imgbank.cz/image/9k9Y - i was freezed at draven ban for more than two mins and than i was kicked from select and -3LP

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot modify your LP for any reasons, so we won't be able to satisfy your request in that regard.

It sounds like you're running into issues with your local network, as you're losing connection to our servers. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you aren't running any network settings that could conflict with League.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
